example.text: An additional observation with the tandem repeat-containing 3? substrates was that the efficiency of bimolecular exon ligation decreased stepwise with each mutation that moved the 5?-most AG 6 nt further downstream such that RNA 3I alternatively splices only 20% as efficiently as RNA 3F (Fig.1 C Left).

An additional observation with the tandem repeat-containing 3? substrates was that the efficiency of bimolecular exon ligation decreased stepwise with each mutation that moved the 5?-most AG 6 nt further downstream such that RNA 3I can alternatively splice only 20% as efficiently as RNA 3F (Fig.1 C Left).
